Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 41st overall pick, by Boston in 2006...
Traded from Boston to Chicago (N) on 6/1/2006 (Going to BOS: 1B J. Hannahan. Going to CHN: CF T. Gillies)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Baltimore on 6/5/2006 (Going to BAL: CF T. Gillies. Going to CHN: P F. Hernandez)...
Traded from Baltimore to Chicago (N) on 5/23/2010 (Going to CHN: P J. Papelbon, DH K. Reese, P J. Hammel, RF T. Gillies. Going to BAL: P J. Kelly, P G. Richards, 3B M. Grissom Jr., C L. Scott)..
.
Had first career hit on 6/11/2013, off Erasmo Ramirez (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/20/2013, off Kenneth Earhart (PIT)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Florida on 1/31/2016 (Going to CHN: C M. Stuber. Going to FLA: RF T. Gillies)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Washington on 5/12/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/13/2019, hitting .516 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Injured on 8/2/2020 with a Strained Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5-6 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Florida on 2/2/2023 to a 2-year deal worth $1,235,698 per year...
